=Actions=
Following actions are supported for Openstack.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.ACTION.GET_AUTH_TOKEN * Action Description: This action is used to authenticate against OpenStack identity service with valid OpenStack credentials and generates a token id. This token could further be used as an input in subsequent actions to other OpenStack services for instance Compute, Storage etc. If user provides the tenant name as an input in OpenStack credentials then the action also generates the tenant id. The result of this action will be the following information published as AE variables: * token id (always in encrypted form) * tenant id * expiration time of the token
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.ACTION.LIST_SERVERS * Action Description: This action is used to get all the servers with corresponding server details from OpenStack cloud and Save the details to provides file path in the XML format.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.ACTION.GET_SERVER_DETAILS * Action Description: This action is used to get the server details from OpenStack cloud as per the specified server id. Output of this action will an xml file path consisting the server information.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.ACTION.CHANGE_SERVER_STATE * Action Description: This action is used to change the state of the server. The action will fail if either the server id is invalid or when the starting and the resultant state are same.Following states are allowed : Start (default), Stop, Reboot_Soft, Reboot_Hard, Pause, Unpause, Lock, Unlock, Suspend, Resume
